alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 12:40AM CDT until September 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haskell County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1240 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Eufaula to 2 miles northeast of Arrowhead State Park to 3 miles south of Crowder, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Stigler... Quinton... Crowder... Whitefield... Kinta... Canadian... Blocker... Robbers Cave State Park... Arrowhead State Park... Enterprise... Lequire... Featherston... Lewisville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
